title: Lag-ingame but ms is stable
body: For the past 3 days I have been experiencing some weird lag when I start playing.When I start a match the game runs well for the first 5 minutes and then its starts lagging.Basically theres a huge delay when I use abilites or start fighting someone.Sometimes my game just stops for a couple seconds until it comes back and 90% of the time im dead.This happens every 5-8 secs.Once I even lost connection and had to restart the game.My ms is always at 56-60 which is the usual.Its frustrating because my connection is fine and this is the only game that shows this issue.I have already tried out the network logs and the site says my games are running fine and tells me theres no issue.Im trying to avoid playing at the moment because not only it ruins my games but my team also suffers as I either stay under tower farming or I feed.Any help is appreciated

replies.body: When you game stutters like that but your ping and fps look perfectly fine, that's a pretty good sign that you're having problems with packet loss. Run a traceroute to the EUW servers at 185.40.65.1 really quickly using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). Post the results back here so I can go over it with you and get you pointed in the right direction to fix this!

So, it definitely looks like your connection is hitting a big spike in packet loss before it ever reaches our servers. All of those "no response from hosts" are showing 0 in the received column which means 100% packet loss. I'd suggest reaching out to your ISP to see if there are any current ongoing issues that would cause something like this.
